name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of experience in ensuring high performance and reliability within the healthcare and financial industries. Strong skills in **technical documentation**, **risk assessment**, and implementing **safety standards**. Proven ability to apply **problem-solving** and **analytical skills** to enhance system performance and reliability.
Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and **CI/CD pipelines**.
Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with **HIPAA**, **FHIR**, **PCI DSS**, and **SOC 2** standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Excellent **communication** and **collaboration** skills to work effectively in diverse teams.
